resilience.name: Resilience
resilience.description: Increases the amount of damage you can take before dying.

mobility.name: Mobility
mobility.description: Increases your movement speed and maximum jump height.

recovery.name: Recovery
recovery.description: Increases the speed at which you regain lost health.

adaptive_frame.name: Adaptive Frame
adaptive_frame.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

lightweight_frame.name: Lightweight Frame
lightweight_frame.description: Superb handling. Move faster with this weapon equipped.

veist_auto.name: Veist Rapid-Fire
veist_auto.description: Full Auto. Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

rapid_fire_frame.name: Rapid-Fire Frame
rapid_fire_frame.description: Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

high_impact_frame.name: High-Impact Frame
high_impact_frame.description: Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

precision_frame.name: Precision Frame
precision_frame.description: This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

hakke_precision_frame.name: Häkke Precision Frame
hakke_precision_frame.description: This weapon fires a small auto-tracking missile. Missiles lock onto targets when aimed.

extended_mag.name: Extended Mag
extended_mag.description: This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.

drop_mag.name: Drop Mag
drop_mag.description: Magazine drops on reload, wasting ammunition but greatly increasing reload speed.

explosive_payload.name: Explosive Payload
explosive_payload.description: Projectiles create an area-of-effect detonation on impact.

tactical_mag.name: Tactical Mag
tactical_mag.description: This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.

appended_mag.name: Appended Mag
appended_mag.description: This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.

sway_redux.name: Dynamic Sway Reduction
sway_redux.description: When holding down the trigger, this weapon's sway-reduction system boosts accuracy and stability over time.

high_caliber_rounds.name: High-Caliber Rounds
high_caliber_rounds.description: Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.

armor_piercing_rounds.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
armor_piercing_rounds.description: Rounds cause extra damage to shields and overpenetrate targets.

under_pressure.name: Under Pressure
under_pressure.description: Improved Stability and Accuracy as the magazine gets lower.

steady_rounds.name: Steady Rounds
steady_rounds.description: This magaizine is optimized for recoil control.

moving_target.name: Moving Target
moving_target.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.

tap_trigger.name: Tap the Trigger
tap_trigger.description: Grants a short period of Increased Stability and Accuracy on initial trigger pull.

flash_hs5.name: Flash HS5
flash_hs5.description: Omolon red-dot. Medium zoom. Highlights enemy targets.

alloy_mag.name: Alloy Magazine
alloy_mag.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.

phase_mag.name: Phase Magazine
phase_mag.description: Increases damage while lowering rate of fire.

outlaw.name: Outlaw
outlaw.description: Precision kills greatly decrease reload time.

sunburn.name: Sunburn
sunburn.description: This weapon fires explosive rounds and highlights targets that take damage from Sunshot.

accurized_rounds.name: Accurized Rounds
accurized_rounds.description: This weapon can fire longer distances.

sun_blast.name: Sun Blast
sun_blast.description: Targets killed with Sunshot explode in Solar energy.

textured_grip.name: Textured Grip
textured_grip.description: The friction on this weapon's grip is particularly strong.

firmly_planted.name: Firmly Planted
firmly_planted.description: Increased accuracy, stability, and handling when firing while crouched.

volatile_launch.name: Volatile Launch
volatile_launch.description: This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.

confined_launch.name: Confined Launch
confined_launch.description: This weapon's launch parameters are particularly stable.

mini_frags.name: Mini Frags
mini_frags.description: Grenades are smaller and more compact for easier reloading.

thermo_grenades.name: Thermoplastic Grenades
thermo_grenades.description: Grenades fired from this weapon bounce further.

pulse_monitor.name: Pulse Monitor
pulse_monitor.description: Automatically reloads a portion of the magazine when wielder is critically wounded.

random_mod.name: Random Mod
random_mod.description: A mod with randomly generated upgrades.

mobile_hunter_armor.name: Mobile Hunter Armor
mobile_hunter_armor.description: Additional mobility at the cost of resilience.

payday.name: Payday
payday.description: Larger magazine. Increased accuracy when firing from the hip.

business_time.name: Business Time
business_time.description: Holding down the trigger boosts this weapon's range and rate of fire, and automatically loads ammo pickups into the magazine.

composite_stock.name: Composite Stock
composite_stock.description: This weapon has a versatile dual-purpose stock.

kill_clip.name: Kill Clip
kill_clip.description: Reloading after a kill grants increased damage.

opening_shot.name: Opening Shot
opening_shot.description: Improved Accuracy and Range on the opening shot of attack.

full_choke.name: Full Choke
full_choke.description: Tightened barrel. Reduces projectile spread when aiming down sights at the cost of precision damage.

smoothbore.name: Smoothbore
smoothbore.description: Smooth shotgun barrel. Greatly increases range at the cost of more projectile spread.

assault_mag.name: Assault Mag
assault_mag.description: This shotgun's magazine is optimized for quick combat.

auto_loading_holster.name: Auto-Loading Holster
auto_loading_holster.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.

heavy_titan_armor.name: Heavy Titan Armor
heavy_titan_armor.description: Additional resilience at the cost of mobility.

restorative_titan_armor.name: Restorative Titan Armor
restorative_titan_armor.description: Improved recovery with a balance of mobility and resilience.

full_auto_trigger_system.name: Full Auto Trigger System
full_auto_trigger_system.description: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.

arc_conductor.name: Arc Conductor
arc_conductor.description: When taking Arc Damage, this weapon becomes more powerful and resists incoming Arc Damage. Kills extend the time in this overcharged state.

superconductor.name: Superconductor
superconductor.description: When Arc Conductor is active, shots fired have the chance to become chain lightning and return ammo.

short_action_stock.name: Short-Action Stock
short_action_stock.description: The weapon is especially easy to grip.

rampage.name: Rampage
rampage.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.

mobile_warlock_armor.name: Mobile Warlock Armor
mobile_warlock_armor.description: Additional mobility at the cost of resilience.

heavy_warlock_armor.name: Heavy Warlock Armor
heavy_warlock_armor.description: Additional resilience at the cost of mobility.

snapshot_sights.name: Snapshot Sights
snapshot_sights.description: Faster time to aim down sights.

zen_moment.name: Zen Moment
zen_moment.description: Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.

high_velocity_rounds.name: High-Velocity Rounds
high_velocity_rounds.description: This weapon's projectiles are particularly light and quick.

infuse.name: Legendary Infusion
infuse.description: Select a piece of Legendary Gear to consume. That item will be used to infuse another item with power.

shader_default.name: Default Shader
shader_default.description: Restores your gear to its default colors.

arc_damage.name: Arc Damage Mod
arc_damage.description: Equip this to a weapon to charge its rounds with Arc energy.

solar_damage.name: Solar Damage Mod
solar_damage.description: Equip this to a weapon to charge its rounds with Solar energy.

void_damage.name: Void Damage Mod
void_damage.description: Equip this to a weapon to charge its rounds with Void energy.

shader_tarnished_copper.name: Tarnished Copper
shader_tarnished_copper.description: Equip this shader to change the color of your gear.

shader_hakke_history_polish.name: Häkke History Polish
shader_hakke_history_polish.description: Equip this shader to change the color of your gear.

shader_cerulean_divide.name: Cerulean Divide
shader_cerulean_divide.description: Equip this shader to change the color of your gear.

shader_xenosilver.name: Xenosilver
shader_xenosilver.description: Equip this shader to change the color of your gear.

shader_suros_modular_shine.name: Suros Modular Shine
shader_suros_modular_shine.description: Equip this shader to change the color of your gear.

shader_nebula_rose.name: Nebula Rose
shader_nebula_rose.description: Equip this shader to change the color of your gear.

shader_bumblebee.name: Bumblebee
shader_bumblebee.description: Equip this shader to change the color of your gear.

shader_veist_poison_shimmer.name: Veist Posion Shimmer
shader_veist_poison_shimmer.description: Equip this shader to change the color of your gear.

showrunner.name: The Showrunner
showrunner.description: Once you have one, you'll wonder how you ever did without.

scathelocke.name: Scathelocke
scathelocke.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

black_scorpion_4sr.name: Black Scorpion-4SR
black_scorpion_4sr.description: I attack from the shadows. I never miss.

urchin_3si.name: Urchin-3SI
urchin_3si.description: I will draw them in, then take them out.

phosphorus_mg4.name: Phosphorus MG4
phosphorus_mg4.description: The star in the east, the fire in the dawn.

acantha_d.name: Acantha-D
acantha_d.description: Your piercing Light knows no limits; your searcher's heart, no bounds.

nightshade.name: Nightshade
nightshade.description: Three drops is all it takes.

does_not_compute.name: Does Not Compute
does_not_compute.description: The engineers aren't ready for us.

deathstalker_4au.name: Deathstalker-4AU
deathstalker_4au.description: I am poised for the strike.

minuet_42.name: Minuet-42
minuet_42.description: SUROS invites you to join the dance.

retrofuturist.name: Retrofuturist
retrofuturist.description: They were so optimisitc about us.

tarantula_3fr.name: Tarantula-3FR
tarantula_3fr.description: No one will escape my web.

needle.name: The Needle
needle.description: Time frays at its edges. We must be the seams.

nergal_pr4.name: Nergal PR4
nergal_pr4.description: Take arms against the lions of death, the kings of sunset.

riskrunner.name: Riskrunner
riskrunner.description: Change your soul and let the electrons sing.

rocket_morrigan_d.name: Morrigan-D
rocket_morrigan_d.description: Your domain is the battlefield. Its ways are your ways.

frumious_grips.name: Frumious Grips
frumious_grips.description: It makes perfect sense to you. And that's all that matters.

frumious_vest.name: Frumious Vest
frumious_vest.description: When have you ever known Hunters to do as they were told?

frumious_strides.name: Frumious Strides
frumious_strides.description: Mostly the hero–but with a healthy dash of the monster, too. That's what it means to be a Hunter.

helmet_took_offense.name: The Took Offense
helmet_took_offense.description: Hunters are big on the "outrageous fortune." Emphasis on outrage. And fortune.

gauntlets_took_offense.name: The Took Offense
gauntlets_took_offense.description: The best defense is offense, because then your enemy's dead. The second-best defense is good armor.

chest_took_offense.name: The Took Offense
chest_took_offense.description: It's all good fun... until it's not.

legs_took_offense.name: The Took Offense
legs_took_offense.description: "Ten paces, sidearms or hand cannons only. Usually to the third red. Do NOT target Ghosts." –"Duels for the Road" by Cayde-6

class_took_offense.name: The Took Offense
class_took_offense.description: This armor may not be as thick as rhino hide, but it does smell better. That's something.

helmet_swordflight_41.name: Swordflight 4.1
helmet_swordflight_41.description: "I will forge you into a weapon stronger than any blade." –Lord Shaxx

gauntlets_swordflight_41.name: Swordflight 4.1
gauntlets_swordflight_41.description: Fly faster. Cut deeper. Burn harder.

chest_swordflight_41.name: Swordflight 4.1
chest_swordflight_41.description: The hotter you burn, the stronger you become.

legs_swordflight_41.name: Swordflight 4.1
legs_swordflight_41.description: "It's not a game. ...Well, it is a game. But it's more than that. Ah, Shaxx says it better. Go ask him." –Cayde-6

class_binary_phoenix_cloak.name: Binary Phoenix Cloak
class_binary_phoenix_cloak.description: The phoenix that fights itself, then rises from its ashes stronger than ever. That is the Crucible.

gauntlets_noble_constant_type_2.name: Noble Constant Type 2
gauntlets_noble_constant_type_2.description: So long as one Titan stands, so too stands the Wall.

legs_noble_constant_type_2.name: Noble Constant Type 2
legs_noble_constant_type_2.description: Our sweat, our sacrifice, our responsibility.

class_noble_constant_mark.name: Noble Constant Mark
class_noble_constant_mark.description: Where you stand, they will fall.

helmet_shelter_in_place.name: The Shelter in Place
helmet_shelter_in_place.description: "Where is your home? That is where you will fight the hardest." –Zavala

gauntlets_shelter_in_place.name: The Shelter in Place
gauntlets_shelter_in_place.description: Some armor doesn't protect you so much as just make the dying slower.

chest_shelter_in_place.name: The Shelter in Place
chest_shelter_in_place.description: This armor won't stop a Cabal round, but it'll buy you some time before you die.

legs_shelter_in_place.name: The Shelter in Place
legs_shelter_in_place.description: "That each of us have many lives to give for the City is the Traveler's greatest gift." –Zavala

class_mark_of_shelter.name: Mark of Shelter
class_mark_of_shelter.description: Titans are both the shelter and the storm.

helmet_phoenix_strife_type_0.name: Phoenix Strife Type 0
helmet_phoenix_strife_type_0.description: "The greatest compliment you can pay in the Crucible is to fight with everything you've got." –Lord Shaxx

gauntlets_phoenix_strife_type_0.name: Phoenix Strife Type 0
gauntlets_phoenix_strife_type_0.description: "Mercy has no place in the Crucible. Going easy does no one any favors." –Lord Shaxx

legs_phoenix_strife_type_0.name: Phoenix Strife Type 0
legs_phoenix_strife_type_0.description: "Fight harder! Any less than your best is an insult to the very core of being a Guardian!" –Lord Shaxx

class_binary_phoenix_mark.name: Binary Phoenix Mark
class_binary_phoenix_mark.description: The phoenix that fights itself, then rises from its ashes stronger than ever. That is the Crucible.

gauntlets_ego_talon_iv.name: Ego Talon IV
gauntlets_ego_talon_iv.description: "A nimble mind makes a nimble trigger finger." – Ikora Rey

chest_ego_talon_iv.name: Ego Talon IV
chest_ego_talon_iv.description: "To know the universe, you must first know yourself." – Ikora Rey

legs_ego_talon_iv.name: Ego Talon IV
legs_ego_talon_iv.description: "Knowledge is its own end." – Toland, the Shattered

class_ego_talon_bond.name: Ego Talon Bond
class_ego_talon_bond.description: "You will find the nightmares grow worse. Thankfully, you no longer have need of sleep" – Gallida Tuyet

helmet_xenos_vale_iv.name: Xenos Vale IV
helmet_xenos_vale_iv.description: It demands a swift and terrible response.

gauntlets_xenos_vale_iv.name: Xenos Vale IV
gauntlets_xenos_vale_iv.description: There is no City without the Warlocks.

chest_xenos_vale_iv.name: Xenos Vale IV
chest_xenos_vale_iv.description: We were all strangers once. Event the Traveler.

legs_xenos_vale_iv.name: Xenos Vale IV
legs_xenos_vale_iv.description: The realm of the strange is the Warlock's home.

class_xenos_vale_bond.name: Xenos Vale Bond
class_xenos_vale_bond.description: New things are only strange until you behold them. Then they are even stranger.

helmet_ankaa_seeker_iv.name: Ankaa Seeker IV
helmet_ankaa_seeker_iv.description: We have much to teach each other.

gauntlets_ankaa_seeker_iv.name: Ankaa Seeker IV
gauntlets_ankaa_seeker_iv.description: Focus not on the death, but on the rebirth.

chest_ankaa_seeker_iv.name: Ankaa Seeker IV
chest_ankaa_seeker_iv.description: The hotter the furnace, the purer the metal.

legs_ankaa_seeker_iv.name: Ankaa Seeker IV
legs_ankaa_seeker_iv.description: "Developing a theory is one thing – proving it in the field quite another. That's the beauty of the Crucible." –Ikora Rey

class_binary_phoenix_bond.name: Binary Phoenix Bond
class_binary_phoenix_bond.description: The phoenix that fights itself, then rises from its ashes stronger than ever. That is the Crucible.

last_city_shell.name: Last City Shell
last_city_shell.description: For Ghosts who call the Last City home.

helios_strain.name: Helios Strain
helios_strain.description: A Vector-class refit designed for near-solar exploration.

imprint.name: Imprint
imprint.description: A Vector-class refit with experimental subspace engines.

meridian_sv.name: Meridian SV
meridian_sv.description: The thin line between us and them.

eos_raptor.name: Eos Raptor
eos_raptor.description: A Minerva-class refit commemorating the legendary Warlock Tinasha-3, known to her peers in the Iron Banner as Ashraven.

leonid_mv.name: Leonid MV
leonid_mv.description: Minerva-class refit. Break any storm that finds you..

sojourner.name: Sojourner
sojourner.description: Retrofitted Nautilus-class for long jaunts from Earth... or farther, if you decide to never come home again.
